akn:content.akn:p:
§ 70508. Robotic or human servicing of spacecraft The Administrator shall take all necessary steps to ensure that provision is made in the design and construction of all future observatory-class scientific spacecraft intended to be deployed in Earth orbit or at a Lagrangian point in space for robotic or human servicing and repair to the extent practicable and appropriate. (Pub. L. 111–314, § 3, Dec. 18, 2010, 124 Stat. 3432.)
